projects.name: Skysolver
highlights: Used Python, Numpy, and Pandas to streamline work tasks, and automate large scale file generation and organization within Windows.
A rigorous introduction into conceptualizing and organizing a large data project
Aim to solve complicated airline scheduling during high cancellations/ delays
To simulate operations, built backend flight and crew systems from scratch
Deep dive into planning and executing scalable data objects to solve real world problems

projects.name: The Association Between New Housing in Large Metropolitan Areas and Migration to Areas with Higher Crime
highlights: Successfully automated tasks in excel and used excel to automate things within other applications
Efficiently located and merged data from around fifty different data sets
Created a model to isolate the effect of new housing on movement

education.studyType: Bachelor of Science, Bachelor of Business Administration

work.name: Darae & Friends Catering
highlights: Developed the ability to listen to verbal and nonverbal cues from stakeholders to manage, predict and meet needs
Effectively worked through language barriers, and kept team cohesion and morale during tense times within our multicultural workplace
Learned how to effectively train new colleagues in a friendly manner, while still ensuring work standards were clear
